title: Cannot log into League 17/06/17 Please help
body:
"An unexpected error has occurred while logging in, please try again later". 

I have tried; 

Resetting my password
Repairing the client
Shift+Restarting my PC
Clean Windows Boot
Some other random fixes to do with the client's scaling

Anyone have any other solutions?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
